thread.title: Moto G5 Plus reportedly launching in India in March for Rs 15,000
thread.title_full: Moto G5 Plus reportedly launching in India in March for Rs 15,000

title: Moto G5 Plus reportedly launching in India in March for Rs 15,000
text:
Moto G5 Plus reportedly launching in India in March for Rs 15,000 Moto G5 Plus reportedly launching in India in March for Rs 15,000 By - January 17, 2017 “The Moto G5 Plus with 4GB of RAM, 32GB of storage, and 13MP/5MP cameras will cost around Rs 15,000” OLX Romania 
Lenovo recently sent out invites to the press for an event on February 26th ahead of MWC in Barcelona. The brand is expected to launch the Moto G5 and Moto G5 Plus smartphones at the event. Now ahead of the unveiling, the Moto G5 Plus’ specs and price have been leaked. 
According to techdroider , the Moto G5 Plus will feature a 5.5-inch full HD Super AMOLED display with a layer of Gorilla Glass 4. It will be powered by a 2.0GHz octa-core Qualcomm Snapdragon 625 processor, mated to Adreno 506 graphics and 4GB of RAM. It will come with 32GB of expandable storage, 13MP/ 5MP cameras, Android Nougat, and a 3,080mAh battery. The device will be available in black, silver and gold hues. 
As per the source, the Moto G5 Plus will cost around $300 in the US, while Indian users will have to pay around Rs 15,000. If the reports are to be believed, the Moto G5 and G5 Plus will be launched in India in March, soon after the unveiling at MWC.
